name: English
_subFileChoose: Choose SBV file(Subtitle file from YouTube)
_oSubFileInfo:
The file format should be .sbv.
To define speaker, please use:or：(：).
To define diffent speaker in same line, please use,,&or、(、).
_oColFileInfo:
The file format should be .json.
You can generate this file from convertor and download it.
_htu1: Click Browse under Subtitle File and select .sbv file.
_htu2:
If you don't have speaker colour setting json file, you can create a new one on Speaker Colour Setting. You can move to step2A.
If you have speaker colour setting json file, you can upload your file to Speaker Colour Setting. You can move to step2B.
_htu2a:
To add a new speaker, please click + button which is at the end of session Speaker Colour Setting.
Please type the name of speaker which same to the original subtitle file and the format of colour is HEX e.g.#FFFFFF(but don't need to type#).
If you want to download the file of speaker colour setting, click save button next to load button.
_htu2b:
Click Browse under Speaker Colour Setting and select .json file.
If success, the speaker colour setting will auto show.
If you cannot see the speaker colour setting, try click load button next to Browse button.
If still cannot show the speaker colour setting, there have on your file and try to make a new one.
If you want to download the file of speaker colour setting, click save button next to load button.
_htu3: Click Convert at the end of the page. The .xml file will download.
_htuytcc: How to use for Youtube CC
_htuytcc1: Download subtitle file with sbv file format on Youtube.
_htuytcc2: Upload subtitle file and add Speaker Colour Setting. Then click download.
_htuytcc4:
Upload the .xml file.
The subtitle colour will not show in YouTube subtitle editor, but it will show after you publish it.
The subtitle colour will disappear after using YouTube subtitle editor to edit the subtitle.
_ytCCAlert: Please make sure that the YouTube CC subtitle area published.
_googleLogin: Please login your Google account in Google website first. The YouTUbe download/upload subtitle functions need permission of access your Google account below.
_privacyBody: Subtitle Speaker Colour Convertor will not store any data in our server. The data that provide in convertor only store and progress in your browser apart from uploading subtitle to YouTube.The data from google will not store and only use to download subtitle from YouTube and upload subtitle to YouTube. We will only use/do the fllowing data/action: list, update and upload YouTube video's captions. Other unnecessary data will not be use.My app will use https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.force-ssl to let user download and upload convert YouTube subtitle colour through my app.
